entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 70 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h except gusting to 50 over exposed coastal sections. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3 with risk of frost. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low plus 3 with risk of frost. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
